reviewText: A final glimpse at the hardest working and most out-spoken American artist of the 20th century!  This film documents Thomas Hart Benton and his artistic working methods.  The viewer gets to spend time observing the master in his studio during the creation of his final painting, "The Sources of Country Music".  The music, which accompanies the film, traces the roots of country music complementing the subject of the painting.  The only drawback to the film is that it is too short.  I would love to see an un-edited version of the film because I finished watching it yearning for more...
